description: A diagnosed emissions control experiment forced with CO2 emissions diagnosed from historical and yr2010CO2 simulations. All other forcings are the same as in the historical and yr2010CO2 simulations.  Include all anthropogenic, solar, and volcanic forcing. Anthropogenic forcing includes aerosol emissions, non-CO2 greenhouse gas emissions, and land use changes.  CO2 concentration calculated (i.e. emission driven). Run from 1850 to approx 2115 for ESMs and longer (up to 5000 years) for EMICs (Earth System Models of Intermediate Complexity) and box models.
long_name: historical emissions followed by fixed 2010 emissions (both model-diagnosed)
rationale: Control simulation for the CDR-yr2010-pulse experiment.

requirements.description: Run from 1850 to 2115 minimum.
requirements.label: 1850-2115 266yrs min

requirements.description: Run from 1850 for a mazimum of 5160 years.
requirements.label: 1850-7009 5160yrs max

requirements.description: CO2 emissions diagnosed from the historical simulation. i.e., year 1850 to 2010.
requirements.label: diagnosed historical CO2 emissions

requirements.description:
CO2 emissions diagnosed from the yr2010CO2 simulation. Emissions required from 2010 to
approximately year 2115 for Earth System Models (ESMs) and longer for EMICs and box models (up to 5000 years).
requirements.label: diagnosed 2010 CO2 emissions

requirements.description: Forcing data for historical CMIP6 runs. Time varying global annual mean concentrations for the long-lived greenhouse-gases excluding CO2, but including: CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
requirements.keywords: historical, well mixed greenhouse gas, WMGHG, No CO2, Non-CO2 WMGHG
requirements.label: Historical WMGHG Concentrations Excluding CO2

requirements.description: Global annual mean 2010 concentrations for non-CO2 long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
requirements.label: 2010 Non-CO2 Well Mixed GHG

requirements.description: Mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
requirements.label: Historical Aerosol Forcing

requirements.description: Apply 2010 mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
requirements.label: 2010 Aerosol Forcing

requirements.description: Apply the global gridded land-use forcing datasets to link historical land-use data and future projections.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
requirements.label: Historical Land Use

requirements.description: Apply the global gridded land-use forcing datasets for 2010.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
requirements.label: 2010 Land Use

requirements.description: Apply historical stratospheric aerosol concentrations from the stratospheric aerosol data set (SADS Version 2)
requirements.label: Historical Stratospheric Aerosol

requirements.description: Apply 2010 stratospheric aerosol concentrations from the stratospheric aerosol data set (SADS Version 2)
requirements.label: 2010 Stratospheric Aerosol

requirements.canonical_name: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations
requirements.description: An ozone concentration database encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere and a stratospheric water vapour concentration database.
requirements.keywords: Historical, stratospheric, ozone, water vapour, O3, H2O, concentration
requirements.label: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations

requirements.description: 2010 ozone concentrations encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere and a stratospheric water vapour concentration.
requirements.keywords: 2010, stratospheric, ozone, water vapour, O3, H2O, concentration
requirements.label: 2010 O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations

requirements.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which consists of historical reconstructions (1850-2014).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, Historical, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: Historical Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: 2010 solar irradiance. The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which consists of historical reconstructions (1850-2014).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, 2010, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: 2010 Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: Historical solar particle forcing (1850-2014). For models with interactive stratospheric chemistry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair production by galactic cosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Historical, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Historical Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: 2010 solar particle forcing. For models with interactive stratospheric chemistry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair production by galactic cosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, 2010, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: 2010 Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: Initialise from the end of the esm-piControl experiment.
requirements.label: esmpiControlEndInit

requirements.description: One ensemble member
requirements.label: SingleMember

requirements.description: Use a fully coupled Earth System Model which explicitly models the movement of Carbon through the Earth system.  Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with biogeochemistry.
requirements.keywords: AOGCM-BGC, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model with BioGeoChemistry, Earth System Model, ESM
requirements.label: AOGCM-BGC Configuration
